main: ^Sounds like you had a hell of a time.
^I would not mind one. That, or a few days' worth of sleep.
^Sorry to say there's only so much I can do on that front. Sounds like I heard right, though?
^The creatures are one thing. I am starting to get used to them, in a way. They are easier to kill, at least.
^It's the cult. Knowing this was brewing beneath our feet.
^I hear you. But something like that? It's so damned crazy that nobody'd ever think of it.
^Point is, don't kick yourself over something you can't change. Just plant your next foot firm.
^I did follow your lead, by the way. It led me to the abandoned mines west of here.
^There were almost more questions there than answers, but now I know for certain that Pacific Manifest is involved in all this. Maybe the ones that started it all.
^Well, I'm glad you made it back in one piece. Two pieces? How does that work?
^Ha. My arm and I thank you, Ruby.
^Sure thing. I'd say to go get some rest, but something tells me there's no point.
^I still have one last lead to follow. Maybe next time.
